text: Hanki ama ana zama fore'ma haniana na'ankure, Israeli vahe'ene Juda vahe'mo'zama Anumzamofo nanekema eri tre'za kumi'ma hu'naza zanku huno fore hugahie. Maka Israeli vahe'mo'za kumira hu'nazankino, iza ana knazana erigahie? Ugagota ran kuma Sameria kuma'mo ana knazana erisanigeno, Juda vahe'mo'zama havi anumzante'ma mono'ma hunentaza kumara iga me'ne? E'i Jerusalemi kumakino agra'a knazana erigahie.
